userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation: [Identification of item], Jackson Memorial Association Minute Book, WLU Coll. 0150, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA.
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections staff to verify the appropriate format.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Jackson Memorial Association formed in 1883 to raise funds for a monument to Thomas J. 'Stonewall' Jackson in Lexington Cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This minute book contains Executive Committee minutes, treasurer's reports, and plans for a monument to Stonewall Jackson in the Lexington Cemetery. Also included a four page pamphlet, "As Others See, Stonewall Jackson Memorial, Inc., Lexington, Virginia, Editorial Comment, Comments by Columnists, and Comments by Individuals.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.
